result.markdown:
---
title: "Figure 2.1: A representation of an absolute space"
execute: 
  cache: true
  freeze: auto
---


A simple visualisation of geo-atoms in absolute space


::: {.cell hash='fig2-01-absolute-space_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_cf2b0b77f71041bb691e315bf68cc9ee'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(plot3D)
library(dplyr)
```
:::


There isn't a lot to this. Just make a bunch of random numbers...


::: {.cell hash='fig2-01-absolute-space_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_6f1b6355e4105757c0b7459ebe914a08'}

```{.r .cell-code}
data <- data.frame(x = rnorm(30), y = rnorm(30), z = rnorm(30))
```
:::


... and plot them.


::: {.cell hash='fig2-01-absolute-space_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_74172ac975b3e57214f7f3799fb16bdb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
scatter3D(x = data$x, y = data$y, z = data$z, 
          theta = 25, phi = 30, scale = FALSE, 
          xlim = range(data$x) * 1.1, 
          ylim = range(data$y) * 1.1, 
          zlim = range(data$z) * 1.1, 
          pch = 19, col = "#999999", bty = "u", type = "h", 
          asp = 1, col.axis = "#333333", col.panel = "#eeeeee", 
          col.grid = "#666666", lwd.grid = 0.2, nticks = 6)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](fig2-01-absolute-space_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
